    • Method Detail

      • printBadGuesses

        public java.lang.String printBadGuesses()
        MethodName: printBadGuesses Purpose: Prints out the array filled with the incorrect guesses the player and displays them in the console.
        Returns:
        String representation of the players bad Hangman guesses so far

      • printDisplayWord

        public java.lang.String printDisplayWord​(char[] originalWord)
        MethodName: printDisplayWord Purpose: Displays only the letters of the current word that the player has correctly guessed. Otherwise a "-" is used to indicate that the player has yet to guess that letter. This also returns the char[] to compare with the actual current word later to determine whether the player has won.
        Parameters:
        originalWord - Word to guess and used to determine the length of the fLetters char[]
        Returns:
        The char[] of the word being displayed

      • removeGuess

        public char[] removeGuess​(char[] originalWord,
                          char guess,
                          int amount)
        MethodName: removeGuess Purpose: Returns a char[] with the length of the of the original word - the amount of times the guess appears in the word. It achieves this by allocating an array of such a length through comparisons of all the words letters with the players guess.
        Parameters:
        originalWord - The whole original random word
        guess - Current player char guess
        amount - Amount of letters found of the guess that will be removed
        Returns:
        A char[] of the random word - the already guessed chars

      • playerGuess

        public int playerGuess​(java.lang.String guess,
                       char[] currWord)
        MethodName: playerGuess Purpose: Returns the amount of times a player's guess appears in the hangman word. If it returns 0, it is assumed that the letter does not appear in the word.
        Parameters:
        guess - The players current guess
        currWord - The random/hangman word
        Returns:
        The total amount of times the player guess appears in the word

      • beenUsed

        public boolean beenUsed​(char guess)
        MethodName: beenUsed Purpose: Checks to see if the player has used the guessed letter before to avoid them using the same letter twice
        Parameters:
        guess - Players char letter guess
        Returns:
        True if the letter has been guessed already, False Otherwise

      • continueGame

        public boolean continueGame()
        MethodName: continueGame Purpose: Asks the player whether or not they would like to keep playing. If the player does not answer y or n then the game will continue asking until they do.
        Returns:
        True to continue game, False Otherwise

      • containsGuess

        public boolean containsGuess​(char guess)
        MethodName: containsGuess Purpose: Determines whether a letter is contained within the char[] of good guesses. This helps determine whether or not the player should be allowed to see that "guess" letter
        Parameters:
        guess - Players Guess
        Returns:
        True if the guess is within the word, False otherwise

      • inBadGuess

        public boolean inBadGuess​(char guess)
        MethodName: inBadGuess Purpose: Determines whether a letter is contained within the char[] of bad guesses. This helps to not show any repeated guesses when printing the badGuesses array.
        Parameters:
        guess - Players Guess
        Returns:
        True if the the players wrong guess has already been input, false otherwise
